issue.title: [CF 1056] LUA Errors (Group Controllers?)
issue.body:
Was playing around with group controllers last night, seeing how they worked and using them to clean up some real estate for my TMW setup when in config and whatnot.

http://pastebin.com/1nKU1Dad
http://pastebin.com/k64jmTQE

From what I can tell, the LUA error prevents the group controller from populating the group with the referred icons, and also seemed to prevent the icons from having timers on them. Both issues are intermittent. Sometimes it'll work on one arena frame and not the other.

http://puu.sh/e0uXt/5e8dae56c6.jpg

Example in top left of screen. Top left is the icons being referred to the group controller. The icons at their referred point (attached to arena frames) don't show the proper cooldowns as the original icons before referring (top left).

Can upload my auras as needed.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy | Imported from CurseForge issue #1056 | Raw

comments.body:
Also, I dunno if this is relevant or news to you, but disabling a global group isn't actually global. I have to disable the global group in question on every toon I log in on. I noticed this when I was getting LUA errors on toons I logged in on today, and the groups were turned on for them.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy

The setting specifically says that it will only affect the current profile. Perhaps it would be wise to allow global disabling of a global group, though.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I just assumed the global group would also enable/disable globally. If not, whatever, that was just something I thought I'd add to the main issue

Edited Jan 5, 2015

> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy
